commands.name: az pipelines runs artifact download
commands.syntax:
az pipelines runs artifact download --artifact-name
                                    --path
                                    --run-id
                                    [--detect {false, true}]
                                    [--org]
                                    [--project]

commands.name: az pipelines runs artifact list
commands.summary: List artifacts associated with a run.
commands.syntax:
az pipelines runs artifact list --run-id
                                [--detect {false, true}]
                                [--org]
                                [--project]

commands.name: az pipelines runs artifact upload
commands.syntax:
az pipelines runs artifact upload --artifact-name
                                  --path
                                  --run-id
                                  [--detect {false, true}]
                                  [--org]
                                  [--project]
